sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a94e55fa2f9520101638debcf699b6db
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.secondProject</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>secondProject</name><script><![CDATA[var secondProject = Class.create();
secondProject.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getLocation: function(){
		var loc = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		loc.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
		//gs.addInfoMessage("Did this work; plus the value: " + loc.location.getDisplayValue());
		return loc.location.getDisplayValue();
	},
	
	getCountry: function(){
		var count = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		count.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
		//gs.addInfoMessage("Did Country display? " + count.location.country.getDisplayValue());
		return count.location.country.getDisplayValue();
	},
	
    type: 'secondProject'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alexis</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-29 03:07:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>a94e55fa2f9520101638debcf699b6db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>secondProject</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a94e55fa2f9520101638debcf699b6db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alexis</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-29 16:09:22</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="fbb2e2eedb302010aadf874239961902" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Project2">8f526be62f5120101638debcf699b641</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7b799c7e2fd120101638debcf699b616</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>changingCountry</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	if(newValue != 'domestic'){
		g_form.setValue('country', '');
	}
	
	if(newValue == 'domestic'){
		//g_form.addInfoMessage("Did this trigger?");
		//g_user.userID
		var setLocation = new GlideAjax('secondProject');
		setLocation.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCountry');
		setLocation.addParam('sysparm_userID', g_form.getValue('requested_for'));

		setLocation.getXML(callCountry);

		// the callback function for returning the result from the server-side code
		function callCountry(response) {
			var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer"); 
			//alert("Caller Manager is " + answer);
			//g_form.addInfoMessage("Was Country obtained? " + answer);
			g_form.setValue('country', answer);
			}
		}
	
	
	/*var count = g_form.getReference(newValue, newCountry);
	g_form.addInfoMessage("Outside the loop" + g_form.getValue(newValue));
	g_form.addInfoMessage("Outside the loop2: " + g_form.getReference(newValue));
	function newCountry(count){
		g_form.setValue('country',count.country);
		g_form.addInfoMessage("Third: " + count);
	}*/

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alexis</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-29 06:23:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>fbb2e2eedb302010aadf874239961902</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4de0123e2f1920101638debcf699b680</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>changingCountry</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4de0123e2f1920101638debcf699b680</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alexis</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-01 00:23:05</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="fbb2e2eedb302010aadf874239961902" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Project2">8f526be62f5120101638debcf699b641</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>changingOrigin</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   
	var setLocation = new GlideAjax('secondProject');
	setLocation.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getLocation');
	setLocation.addParam('sysparm_userID', g_form.getValue('requested_for'));
	
	setLocation.getXML(callLocation);
	
	// the callback function for returning the result from the server-side code
	function callLocation(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer"); 
		//alert("Caller Manager is " + answer);
		//g_form.addInfoMessage("From the Client Script side. Worked? " + answer);
		g_form.setValue('origin', answer);
}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alexis</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-29 05:56:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>fbb2e2eedb302010aadf874239961902</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>45e94ab62f1920101638debcf699b641</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>changingOrigin</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_45e94ab62f1920101638debcf699b641</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alexis</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-29 16:20:26</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var loc = g_form.getReference('newValue', populateReqForDetails);

	function populateReqForDetails(loc) {
	g_form.setValue('location', loc.location);
	} 

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alexis</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-28 21:12:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>fbb2e2eedb302010aadf874239961902</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>293490ba2fd120101638debcf699b6c0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>changingLocation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_293490ba2fd120101638debcf699b6c0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alexis</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-28 21:20:16</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="fbb2e2eedb302010aadf874239961902" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Project2">8f526be62f5120101638debcf699b641</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:61097ba62f9120101638debcf699b610</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>changingLocation</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	var setLocation = new GlideAjax('secondProject');
	setLocation.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getLocation');
	setLocation.addParam('sysparm_userID', newValue);
	
	setLocation.getXML(callLocation);
	
	// the callback function for returning the result from the server-side code
	function callLocation(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer"); 
		//alert("Caller Manager is " + answer);
		//g_form.addInfoMessage("From the Client Script side. Worked? " + answer);
		g_form.setValue('location', answer);
}
	
	/*g_form.addInfoMessage("First: " + newValue);
	g_form.addInfoMessage("Second: " + g_user.userID);
	
	
	var locPrac = g_form.getReference('newValue');
	g_form.addInfoMessage("First locationLocation: "+ locPrac);
	
	var locPrac2 = g_form.getDisplayValue('requested_for');
	g_form.addInfoMessage("Second Location: "+ locPrac2);
	
	var loc = g_form.getReference(newValue, populateReqForDetails);
	function populateReqForDetails(loc) {
	g_form.setValue('location', loc.location);
	g_form.addInfoMessage("The location of Requestor: " + loc.location);
	} */
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alexis</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-28 21:12:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>fbb2e2eedb302010aadf874239961902</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>293490ba2fd120101638debcf699b6c0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>changingLocation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_293490ba2fd120101638debcf699b6c0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alexis</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-29 03:49:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="fbb2e2eedb302010aadf874239961902" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Project2">8f526be62f5120101638debcf699b641</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:61097ba62f9120101638debcf699b610</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>changingOrigin_V2</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	var setLocation = new GlideAjax('secondProject');
	setLocation.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getLocation');
	setLocation.addParam('sysparm_userID', newValue);
	
	setLocation.getXML(callLocation);
	
	// the callback function for returning the result from the server-side code
	function callLocation(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer"); 
		//alert("Caller Manager is " + answer);
		//g_form.addInfoMessage("From the Client Script side. Worked? " + answer);
		g_form.setValue('origin', answer);
}
	
	/*g_form.addInfoMessage("First: " + newValue);
	g_form.addInfoMessage("Second: " + g_user.userID);
	
	
	var locPrac = g_form.getReference('newValue');
	g_form.addInfoMessage("First locationLocation: "+ locPrac);
	
	var locPrac2 = g_form.getDisplayValue('requested_for');
	g_form.addInfoMessage("Second Location: "+ locPrac2);
	
	var loc = g_form.getReference(newValue, populateReqForDetails);
	function populateReqForDetails(loc) {
	g_form.setValue('location', loc.location);
	g_form.addInfoMessage("The location of Requestor: " + loc.location);
	} */
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alexis</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-29 16:25:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>fbb2e2eedb302010aadf874239961902</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>826c10c32f9d20101638debcf699b62a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>changingOrigin_V2</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_826c10c32f9d20101638debcf699b62a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alexis</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-31 21:20:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
